thread.title: 49ers release disgruntled cornerback Shareece Wright

author: Quaid taken into custody in Vermont trying to cross border
title: 49ers release disgruntled cornerback Shareece Wright
text:
49ers release disgruntled cornerback Shareece Wright theScore 11 hrs ago © Michael Zagaris / Getty Images Sport / Getty The San Francisco 49ers have released cornerback Shareece Wright .
AdChoices Wright, unhappy with the lack of playing time he was getting this season, asked for his release if the team was unable to trade him.
After signing a one-year, $3-million deal with the 49ers in March, Wright did not play a snap for the team. Wright tallied one interception during his first four seasons with the San Diego Chargers .
With veteran corners in high demand, it's likely that Wright will be able to catch on with another team this season.
The 49ers added guard Andrew Tiller from their practice squad in a corresponding move.
